titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit rollovers from health savings accounts to Medicare Advantage MSAs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/6/2014--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit a tax-free rollover of funds in a health savings account (HSA) into a Medicare Advantage Medical Savings Account (MSA).
